bib.title: Towards an event annotated corpus of Polish
bib.author: Marci{\'n}czuk, Micha{\l} and Oleksy, Marcin and Berna{\'s}, Tomasz and Koco{\'n}, Jan and Wolski, Micha{\l}
bib.abstract: The paper presents a typology of events built on the basis of TimeML specification adapted to Polish language. Some changes were introduced to the definition of the event categories and a motivation for event categorization was formulated. The event annotation task is presented on two levels–ontology level (language independent) and text mentions (language dependant). The various types of event mentions in Polish text are discussed. A procedure for annotation of event mentions in Polish texts is presented and evaluated. In the
